python_kemptech_api.utils.build_object(class_to_build, access_info, data_for_instance)[source]

Factory method that can can build instances of BaseKempObject

Parameters:
  • class_to_build – Subclass of BaseKempObject
  • access_info – Access info that will allow it to attach to parent
  • data_for_instance – Default data for class instance
Returns:

Instance of class populated with access info and default data

Parameters:data – The variable to be cast to a list.
Returns:The data in a list
python_kemptech_api.utils.falsey_to_none(var)[source]

Certain parameters return invalid 0 when they should be False

This function takes a variable, checks if its ‘falsey’ and return it with the value of None if it is. :param var: The variable to check :return: The variable that was given, with value of None if it was falsey
